text.section:
Within 21 days after the change, a licensee shall submit to the Secretary written notice of:
the addition of a branch office; and
a change in the address of the private home detention monitoring agency or branch office.

The licensee shall submit with the notice:
a photocopy of the agency license certificate; and
if the proposed change affects an existing branch office, a photocopy of the branch office certificate for that office.

The Secretary shall issue a new agency license certificate and, if applicable, a new branch office certificate, both of which shall set forth the same expiration date as the original agency license certificate.
